snippet: Oprah Winfrey's network prepares to show the Lance Armstrong interview. John Green, the author and video blogger, goes from YouTube to Carnegie Hall. Apps for the ski slopes.
abstract: Oprah Winfrey's network prepares to show the Lance Armstrong interview. John Green, the author and video blogger, goes from YouTube to Carnegie Hall. Apps for the ski slopes.

headline.main: TimesCast Media+Tech: Lance Armstrong Faces the Media
